walletCards.title: Wallet Loyalty Cards
walletCards.description: The heart of a modern loyalty program. No apps to download, no plastic cards to carry. Just a frictionless experience in Apple & Google Wallet.
walletCards.nativeDesc: Leverage the native wallets already installed on 99% of smartphones. Apple Wallet and Google Wallet are trusted, secure, and always accessible.
walletCards.updatesDesc: Points balance, tier status, and coupons update instantly on the card face. Keep customers informed without them having to check an app.
walletCards.frictionlessDesc: Customers can add their card via QR code, SMS link, email, or a tap in your existing app. 2-click installation boosts adoption rates by up to 5x.
walletCards.ctaDesc: Switch to Wallet Loyalty Cards and engage your customers where they actually pay attention.

pointsProgram.title: Advanced Point Programs
pointsProgram.description: Design your own reward system with total freedom. Adapt it to your business model, commercial objectives, and real customer behavior.
pointsProgram.configDesc: Far from rigid schemes, Omniwallet offers a flexible and dynamic system where points become a strategic tool.
configItems: Use points as direct cashback on future purchases.
Adjust values for specific campaigns or segments.
pointsProgram.dynamicDesc: Points aren't fixed. Modify them based on:

dynamicItems.transaction: Transaction Details: Product, category, amount, margin.
dynamicItems.moments: Key Moments: Seasonal campaigns, Black Friday, Sales.
dynamicItems.user: User Data: Birthday, tier level, history.

pointsProgram.ctaTitle: Ready to launch your points program?

customerTiers.title: Customer Tiers (Levels)
customerTiers.description: Segment and reward customers based on their real value over time. Create a clear, motivating progression path.
customerTiers.smartDesc: Define multipliers for point earning based on user level. Offer exclusive rewards and advantages like non-expiring points for top tiers.
customerTiers.progressionDesc: Levels are fully integrated with workflows. Benefits apply automatically in every transaction, online and offline.
customerTiers.statusDesc: Implement reversible degradation rules for inactivity to encourage recurrence without permanently penalizing the customer.
customerTiers.ctaTitle: Build a flexible, fair tier system

loyaltyMarket.title: Loyalty Market
loyaltyMarket.description: An out-of-the-box rewards marketplace. Activate a complete loyalty program from day one without operational complexity.
loyaltyMarket.diverseDesc: Offer physical products, digital goods, coupon pools for eCommerce, and combine your own prizes with third-party rewards.
loyaltyMarket.brandsDesc: Offer instant digital gift cards from Amazon, Decathlon, El Corte Inglés, Repsol, Adidas, and 30+ more.
loyaltyMarket.fulfillmentDesc: Zero friction. Points are redeemed, rewards generated in real-time, and delivered immediately (digitally or via defined channels).

pushNotifications.title: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.description: Direct, immediate communication to your customers' lock screens via Apple & Google Wallet. No intermediaries, no spam folders.
pushNotifications.lockedDesc: You've reached Gold Tier. Enjoy 2x points today.
pushNotifications.nearbyDesc: You are near our Main St store. Come in for a treat!
pushNotifications.messagingDesc: Send general updates to everyone or targeted messages based on tier, behavior, or purchase history.
pushNotifications.geoDesc: Automatically trigger notifications when a customer is near your store. Connect the physical and digital worlds to drive foot traffic.
pushNotifications.behavioralDesc: Automated alerts for points accumulation, redemption confirmations, or unlocked benefits.

giftCards.title: Gift Cards
giftCards.description: Automated, immediate digital gift card delivery. Integrated directly with your loyalty ecosystem.
giftCards.digitalDesc: Immediate availability via email. Zero logistics costs, zero waiting time. Valid for online and physical stores.
giftCards.prepaidDesc: Corporate prepaid wallet system. Secure your budget—cards are generated only while you have a balance.
giftCards.integrationDesc: Redeem points for gift cards, give them as tier rewards, or send them automatically in birthday campaigns.

gamification.title: Gamification
gamification.description: Advanced prize wheels to boost engagement. Transform everyday actions into playful experiences.
gamification.controlDesc: Set active dates, participation limits, and costs (free vs. points). Control the probability of every outcome.
gamification.customDesc: Match your brand's look and feel completely. Colors, fonts, and images are all configurable.
gamification.strategicDesc: Trigger wheels after a purchase, signup, or tier upgrade. Not just a game—a business tool.
gamification.footerDesc: Combine immediate rewards (points, digital products) with high-value prizes. Increase motivation, reactivate dormant users, and boost purchase frequency.

automatedCampaigns.title: Automated Campaigns
automatedCampaigns.description: Convert data into action. Build completely automated loyalty logic based on real customer behavior and transactions.
automatedCampaigns.acquisitionDesc: Welcome rewards and first-purchase bonuses to accelerate initial conversion.
automatedCampaigns.retentionDesc: Win-back campaigns, birthday rewards, and streak bonuses to keep relationships alive.
automatedCampaigns.growthDesc: Spend-based rewards and tier milestones to increase ticket size and customer value.
automatedCampaigns.trafficDesc: Day-of-week bonuses and limited-time offers to balance demand.
automatedCampaigns.orchestrationDesc: Omniwallet decides automatically if a reward applies, which incentive to give, the amount, and the conditions—all at the exact moment of transaction.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Measure the true ROI of your loyalty program. Track retention, average order value, and customer lifetime value in real-time.
analytics.whyDesc: Data-driven loyalty programs grow 2.5x faster. Understand exactly what rewards drive behaviour.

customerJourney.title: Customer Journey Builder
customerJourney.description: Map out the perfect customer experience. Use our visual builder to create multi-step journeys based on behavior, location, and time.
customerJourney.whyDesc: Generic blasts are dead. Create personalized paths that guide customers to their next purchase.
